content:
# The stone furnace has been successfully crafted! My inventory now contains:
# - 1 stone furnace
# - 12 units of wood

# Next, I will place the stone furnace in the world so that I can start smelting resources. 
# I will find a suitable location to place the furnace.

# For now, I will place the furnace near my current position.
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=current_position)  # Place the stone furnace
print(f"Entities after placing the furnace: {get_entities()}")  # Check the entities to confirm the furnace placement.
